def smallest_subarray_with_sum(arr, target):
    n = len(arr)
    min_length = float('inf')
    start = 1
    end = 0
    current_sum = 0
    while end < n:
        current_sum += arr[end]
        while current_sum >= target:
            min_length = min(min_length, end - start + 1)
            current_sum -= arr[start]
            start += 1
        end += 1
    return min_length if min_length != float('inf') else -1
